songs.title: Fall (Live at the Bedford)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You and I, two of a mind
This love's one of a kind
You and I, we're drifting
Over the edge

[Chorus]
And I will fall for you
And I will fall for you
And if I fall for you
Would you fall too?

[Verse 2]
You and I learning to speak
With kisses on cheek
You and I we're drifting over the edge

[Chorus]
And I will fall for you
And I will fall for you
And if I fall for you
Would you fall too?

[Chorus]
And I will fall for you
And I will fall for you
And if I fall for you
Would you fall too?

[Outro]
Would you fall too?
Would you fall too?
Would you fall too?
Would you fall too?
